com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator.pattern.link
Interface IDependencyLinkValidator

All Known Implementing Classes:
DependencyLinkLocalValidator, DependencyLinkValidator
public interface IDependencyLinkValidator

Implemented by validators of DependencyLink

Not intended to be directly implemented. Use DependencyLinkValidator.

See Also:
UnitValidator.addDependencyLinkValidator(IDependencyLinkValidator)

Method Summary
 boolean appliesTo(Requirement req, Capability cap, DependencyLink link, IDeployValidationContext context)
          Returns true if the validator applies to the dependency link.

Method Detail

appliesTo

boolean appliesTo(Requirement req,
                  Capability cap,
                  DependencyLink link,
                  IDeployValidationContext context)
Returns true if the validator applies to the dependency link.

Parameters:
req - the link source requirement.
cap - the link target capability.
link - a dependency link (may be null if discovered).
context - the deploy validation context.
Returns:
true if the #validate(DependencyLink, IDeployValidationContext, IDeployReporter) method can be invoked.

getValidatorID

java.lang.String getValidatorID()
Returns the identity of the validator.

Returns:
the validator identity.

validate

void validate(Requirement source,
              Capability target,
              DependencyLink link,
              IDeployValidationContext context,
              IDeployReporter reporter)
Validates the dependency link.

Discovered dependency links that not instantiated. The link argument may be null!

Parameters:
source - the dependency link source.
target - the dependency link target.
link - the dependency link to be validated (may be null if discovered).
context - the topology-level validation context (used or indexing).
reporter - used to report errors.
